articles.title: Claire Holt takes a swipe at model Emily Ratajkowski after sharing post-birth flat tummy photo - Daily Mail
articles.description: Emily Ratajkowski made headlines on Saturday after she uploaded an Instagram photo of her impossibly flat stomach just 11 days after giving birth to her first child, Sylvester Apollo Bear.
articles.content:
